author: hiranya
msg: Changing reports plugin version to 2.2 - Previous version causes the maven to throw out an error everytime the dependency report is generated - Known issue in the plugin v2.1.2

author: marvin
msg: Fix memory leak in BoolNum deserialization.
Freezer_thaw() allocates an empty object body before invoking Deserialize(),
but we want Bool_Deserialize() to return either CFISH_TRUE or CFISH_FALSE, so
we must have a means of getting rid of that empty object body.  Ideally, we
would have the CFISH VTable object behave differently than other VTable
objects when VTable_Make_Obj() is invoked, but that's too hard.  Instead, we
make refcounting and object destruction work properly for BoolNum objects in
